metadata.synopsis: Shouted in victory by the Gish Lieutenant after the Emperor dies.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Emperor dies in combat vs Gish.

0.speaker: Prelate Lir'i'c
0.text: Gith'ka tavkim krash'ht! Honour will be ours.
0.context: NodeContext: 'Gith's light guides us' - GITH-ka TAHV-keem KRASH-ht
